details.brokersummary:
Large 2 bedroom located at Bleecker and Cypress at the Ridgewood / Bushwick border!
Close to the Myrtle Wyckoff L / M trains, Boobie Trap Bar, Milk & Pull Coffee, Klom Klorm Restaurant, Old Stanley's Bar, Talon Bar, Bushwick Diner, etc.
- 2 king sized bedrooms on opposite ends - full sized 3rd bedroom in middle - all rooms have natural light - newly renovated
Available 11/1 SMALL pets OK No broker fee

1 bed 1 bath in gorgeous area of Crown Heights
- Elevator building - Newly renovated - Huge bedroom - Big living area with window - On-site super - Stainless steel appliances
10/1 move in Small pets OK No broker fee

Nice new 1 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, sunny kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat and hot Water is included. Could be used as a 1 bedroom --OR--- 1 bedroom + office ---OR--- 2 bedroom with small living area. The choice is yours!
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
Sept 1 move in Small pets OK

Myspace Exclusive!
Reside in a gorgeous 3 bed / 1 bath apartment with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, natural sunlight, modern features, and easy access to trains. Sun drenched and great closet space. You?re just one stop from Manhattan. Close to Domino Park, Social House Cafe, Peter Luger?s. Pies-n-Thighs, etc. Marcy J train nearby.
- Heat and hot water included - SMALL pets are allowed.
Available October 1st (or sooner!) No broker fee

Myspace Exclusive! Large one bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, king sized bedroom, ample closet space, large living room and separate kitchen. Pets are welcome. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
NO BROKER FEE! Small pets OK September 1 move in

Awesome corner unit 2 bedroom in prime Williamsburg!
- no broker fee
2 nice bedrooms Good size living area with lots of sunlight Separate kitchen area Heat and hot water included Live in super
Great location ? near JMZ trains and countless locals restaurants, bars, and coffee shops. The Rosemont, Williamsburg Pizza, Fiction Bar/Cafe, Domino Sugar Factory Park, Williamsburg Bridge, Pies-N-Thighs, Peter Luger, etc
Small pets welcome

Huge pre-war 1 bedroom!
- rent stabilized
1 large bedroom 1 big living room (with windows) Renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances Elevator building Heat and hot water included
Small pets OK Available June 1 Broker fee applies

Myspace Exclusive! Large one bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, king sized bedroom, ample closet space, large living room and separate kitchen. Pets are welcome. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
NO BROKER FEE! Small pets OK 11/1 move in

Super sized 2 bedroom in prime Williamsburg!
- no broker fee
2 nice bedrooms Large living area with windows Stainless steel kitchen Heat and hot water included Exposed brick
Perfect location, near all things that make Williamsburg, Williamsburg! JMZ and G trains nearby. Local hotspots such as L'Industrie Pizzeria, Pies 'n' Thighs, Vanessa's Dumpling House, Banter Bar, Nighthawk Cinema, etc
Available 11/1 Small pets accepted

Myspace Exclusive!
This incredible one bed bedroom apartment is just south of the Williamsburg Bridge and short distance to some of the best restaurants and bars Brooklyn has to offer! The apartment has an L-shaped living area with big windows, stainless steel kitchen, exposed brick.
The building is an extremely well-maintained 1920s prewar featuring stainless appliances, hardwood floors, tons of sunlight, high ceilings and lots of space. Pet friendly, heat & hot water included!
Call today, as this listing will not last.
November 1 move in Small pets OK No fee

Awesome new 1 bedroom for December 1st! Rent stabilized!
- 1 big bedroom - Large living area - Newly renovated
Laundry in building Shared roof deck
Perfect location! Birdy's, Hart Bar, Rebecca's Bar, Santa Panaza Italian, Lone Wolf, Marco's etc. JMZ only 1 block away.
Dec 1st move in Pets OK for additional fee

Awesome new 2 bedroom for November 1st! Rent stabilized!
- 2 big bedrooms - Large living area - Newly renovated
Laundry in building Shared roof deck
Perfect location! Birdy's, Hart Bar, Rebecca's Bar, Santa Panaza Italian, Lone Wolf, Marco's etc. JMZ only 1 block away.
November 1st move in Pets OK for additional fee

2 Bed w/ 4? ? 14? private terrace in a brand new elevator building!
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closets
Building features: ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck Zipcars available Parking is subject to availability ($300/mo extra for designated spot) Bike storage State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok! NO BROKER FEE! Just 1st and security to move in!
Call or text to view the right away. This is priced to GO!

Chic 2 Bedroom / 1bath Apartment with massive private balcony right in the Heart of Bushwick! One large bedroom and one smaller bedroom with a skylight . See video . Second bedroom makes a great office or extra hangout space! Both bedroom fit queen sized beds. Owner will also purchase standing closets if you want. 1min walk to the Dekalb L. 5min to the M train. Featuring:
- Private Balcony - Large Open Living Room - Queen Size Bedrooms - Stainless Steel Appliances - Including Dishwasher - And Microwave! - Laundry in Building - Large windows - Plenty of sunlight! - Elevator - Roof deck - Garage - Zipcar in Garage, yas!
Such a great location, with tons of cafe's, bars and restaurants within a five minute walk! Variety Coffee, Taquiera Cocoyoc, Milk and Pull, The Johnson's, Maria Hernandez Park, and many more!
Just first and security to move in. NO BROKER FEE!!

Featuring: - Large Open Living Room - Queen Size Bedrooms - Stainless Steel Appliances - Including Dishwasher - And Microwave! - Laundry in Building - Large windows - Plenty of sunlight! - Elevator - Roof deck - Garage - Zipcar in Garage, yas!

Beautifully renovated 2br in an elevator building. Has an amazing roof deck with skyline views. Laundry in the building as well. Primo location right off the Morgan stop of the L train. - Elevator- Laundry Room- Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan- Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances- Hardwood floors- Garage under the building - Zip Cars available- Separate enclosed AC/Heating units for each room. Quiet and efficient?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE!Pets OK!note: if you can't see the video please send me a message and I'll send it over.

Everything you?ve been looking for in Bushwick is right here! This 2nr floor, two bedroom in a fun neighborhood has original wood molding details and plenty of windows to allow the natural light to flow in. Massive living room with a window bringing in natural light. Cross the street and sip your morning coffee at Maria Hernandez park. Enjoy the multitude of neighborhood cafes and bars. No need to worry about commute times, the Jefferson L train stop is just two blocks from your door. All this and pet-friendly too!
No fee pets ok Call or text to set up a viewing
2br / 1bath Bedrooms on opposite sides of apartment Renovated kitchen and bath Next to myrtle/wyckoff L and M stop

Virtual tours available!Beautiful 2 bed / 1 bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location!This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse. Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short walk to the J, M trains.

Virtual Tour Available! Beautiful 1.5 BR/1bath apartment in fabulous Bushwick!This apartment is in the pindrop-quiet "rear" building of this unique courtyard complex! It's like your own little treehouse in the middle of Bushwick. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse.No brokers fee!Only First & SecurityContact to schedule your appointment today!

Spacious, beautifully renovated Studio with Balcony in Prime Bushwick ? Elevator building with Garage Parking and Laundry!!
Located near Morgan L and Flushing JM, near Maria Hernandez Park and steps from great bars, restaurants and shopping
Please see video on StreetEasy or send me a message and I?ll send to you. Video is of 3B which is identical as 4B is occupied currently until the end of the month.
Features: - Private Balcony!! - Elevator - Laundry Room - Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan - Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances - Installed PVAC units for AC and Heating - Hardwood floors - Garage with Zip Cars - Designated parking spots ($300/mo)
?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE! Contact us now to set up a viewing!

Beautiful 3BR 3Bath in Boerum Hill featuring: Open layout kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances, Hardwood Floors, shared Rooftop and Laundry in Building.
AMENITIES: ? Central A/C? ? Eat In Kitchen? ? Stainless Steel Appliances? ? Laundry in building? ? Hardwood Floors? ? Video Intercom? ? High Ceilings? ? Roof access ? Shared Backyard
Right in the middle of Carroll Gardens/Gowanus and just blocks away from Barclays Center you can enjoy all of the Shops, Restaurant, Bars and Entertainment from these Amazing Neighborhoods!

Welcome to 487 Keap, a brand new rental building seconds to Metropolitan/Union Avenue L train Very well maintained ? beautiful common areas including a landscaped roof deck with lounge chairs, bar, and outdoor shower. Full service and spacious gym, bike and additional storage are available.
This apartment is rent stabilized, you can enjoy a rent stabilized home, be protected from sharp increases in rent and have the right to renew your lease for years to come.

Beautiful 2 BR/1.5 bath duplex apartment in East Williamsburg, prime location!
This 3 bedroom apartment features spacious living room, queen sized bedroom(s), stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Roberta's, Sweet Science, Honey's, Wayward Social, Syndicated, Guadalupe, Reclamation, Ichiran, Momo Sushi Shack, El Cortez.
Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.
